name: Silver Surfer (itch)
description: The Silver Surfer is sliding through! Ride the cosmic wave doing tricks and collecting orbs of the Power Cosmic resisting Galactus as long as you can. This is the first playable build of a fangame I'm working on, check it out and let me know what you think! I have plenty of ideas for features to add to the game and I'm 100% willing to add requested features as long as I'm capable of executing them. Check out patreon.com/jasonjumps to see how you can further assist development
